channel.title: Server Problems
channel.description:
Hey Mopar, I am running Nixscape and when I try to connect to my DNS at No-ip (runescapeug.servegame.com) it can't connect but when I leave it blank and connect on localhost it allows me to connect. Does this mean that no one else can access my site? If so how do I change and configure my server port? Thanks for your help.
Bryson

item.title: Server Problems
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I logg into my server sometimes with my servs ip… But I usely leave it blank.

Read full topic

the code i got is 5.51.24.235 is that one?
[br][size=1]Posted at: July 18, 2006, 10:56:06 AM[/size][hr]anyone plz
[br][size=1]Posted at: July 18, 2006, 10:57:52 AM[/size][hr]can anyone just tell me server code for moparscape private server client 2

item.title: Server Problems
item.dc:creator: @mehaku mehaku
item.description:
@mehaku wrote:

no, you cant- u could also use 0.0.0.0, but i dont see y you wouldnt wanna leave it blank lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problems
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

no u cannot connect to your own server using your own ip as far as i know either leave ip blank or use localhost
